name: Bombert
description:
Be the last player to survive while the arena is being continuously destroyed in this explosive fast-paced brawler game!

In this demo you will be able to choose among 6 characters and 3 difficulty modes. Test your reflexes and challenge your friends to see who's the first to win 3 rounds.

Note: You will need at least 2 players and controllers (Xbox or PS) to play the game!
(Only training mode can be played solo)

Controllers

- Stick to move
- A (Xbox) press or hold to jump
- X (Xbox) to dash
